trans-unit.source: Policy Element
trans-unit.target: Policy Element

trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="2308b1ce-9735-42c9-97f9-c19825d01f85" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Policy Element</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="2308b1ce-9735-42c9-97f9-c19825d01f85" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Policy Element</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>Policy</embeddedLabel> section in a JSON file that describes an Azure Data Factory table defines policies on the table.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>Policy</embeddedLabel> section in a JSON file that describes an Azure Data Factory table defines policies on the table.

trans-unit.source: Table Validation Policies
trans-unit.target: Table Validation Policies

trans-unit.source: Validation policies enable you to check whether the data fulfills the condition that you specify.
trans-unit.target: Validation policies enable you to check whether the data fulfills the condition that you specify.

trans-unit.source: Specify a policy for a table as follows:
trans-unit.target: Specify a policy for a table as follows:

trans-unit.source: Only one policy name can be specified for a table.
trans-unit.target: Only one policy name can be specified for a table.

trans-unit.source: If more than one policy is specified, an error will be shown.
trans-unit.target: If more than one policy is specified, an error will be shown.

trans-unit.source: Validation policies do not apply to an on-premises SQL Server table.
trans-unit.target: Validation policies do not apply to an on-premises SQL Server table.

trans-unit.source: The list of supported validation polices are shown in the following table:
trans-unit.target: The list of supported validation polices are shown in the following table:

trans-unit.source: Policy Name
trans-unit.target: Policy Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Applied To
trans-unit.target: Applied To

trans-unit.source: minimumSizeMB
trans-unit.target: minimumSizeMB

trans-unit.source: Validates that the data in an Azure blob meets the minimum size requirements (in megabytes).
trans-unit.target: Validates that the data in an Azure blob meets the minimum size requirements (in megabytes).

trans-unit.source: Azure Blob
trans-unit.target: Azure Blob

trans-unit.source: minimumRows
trans-unit.target: minimumRows

trans-unit.source: Validates that the data in an Azure SQL database or an Azure table contains the minimum number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Validates that the data in an Azure SQL database or an Azure table contains the minimum number of rows.

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Database
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Database

trans-unit.source: Azure Table
trans-unit.target: Azure Table

trans-unit.source: validationPriorityOrder
trans-unit.target: validationPriorityOrder

trans-unit.source: Determines the order in which validation is performed on slices.
trans-unit.target: Determines the order in which validation is performed on slices.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: OldestFirst (default) and NewestFirst.
trans-unit.target: Possible values are: OldestFirst (default) and NewestFirst.

trans-unit.source: All
trans-unit.target: All
